00012 EagleLock* EagleSynchronizer_CreateLock(void)
00013 {
00014     EagleLock *lock = (EagleLock*) malloc(sizeof(EagleLock));
00015     pthread_mutex_init(&lock->mutex, NULL);
00016     return lock;
00017 }

00029 void EagleSynchronizer_Lock(EagleLock *lock)
00030 {
00031     pthread_mutex_lock(&lock->mutex);
00032 }
00033

00044 {
00045     pthread_mutex_unlock(&lock->mutex);
00046 }

00048 void EagleLock_Delete(EagleLock *lock)
00049 {
00050     pthread_mutex_destroy(&lock->mutex);
00051     pthread_mutexattr_destroy(&lock->attr);
00052     free(lock);
